com.googlecode.gwt.charts.client.options

Class ColorAxis

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • com.googlecode.gwt.charts.client.options.ColorAxis

  • public class ColorAxis
extends com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
    An object that specifies a mapping between color column values and colors or a gradient scale.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected ColorAxis() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ColorAxis create()
      Default constructor.
      void setColors(String... colors)
      Colors to assign to values in the visualization.
      You must have at least two values; the gradient will include all your values, plus calculated intermediary values, with the first color as the smallest value, and the last color as the highest.
      void setLegend(ColorAxisLegend legend)
      Sets properties of the legend.
      void setMaxValue(double maxValue)
      If present, specifies a maximum value for chart color data.
      void setMinValue(double minValue)
      If present, specifies a minimum value for chart color data.
      void setValues(double... values)
      If present, controls how values are associated with colors.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static ColorAxis create()
        Default constructor.
        Returns:
        a new object

      • setColors

        public final void setColors(String... colors)
        Colors to assign to values in the visualization.
        You must have at least two values; the gradient will include all your values, plus calculated intermediary values, with the first color as the smallest value, and the last color as the highest.
        Parameters:
        colors -

      • setLegend

        public final void setLegend(ColorAxisLegend legend)
        Sets properties of the legend.
        Parameters:
        legend -

      • setMaxValue

        public final void setMaxValue(double maxValue)
        If present, specifies a maximum value for chart color data. Color data values of this value and higher will be rendered as the last color in the colorAxis.colors range.
        Parameters:
        maxValue -

      • setMinValue

        public final void setMinValue(double minValue)
        If present, specifies a minimum value for chart color data. Color data values of this value and lower will be rendered as the first color in the colorAxis.colors range.
        Parameters:
        minValue -

      • setValues

        public final void setValues(double... values)
        If present, controls how values are associated with colors. Each value is associated with the corresponding color in the colorAxis.colors array. These values apply to the chart color data. Coloring is done according to a gradient of the values specified here. Not specifying a value for this option is equivalent to specifying [minValue, maxValue].
        Parameters:
        values -
